name: RTP SnowGlobe 09
description:
Wishing you could escape to a wintry getaway, but can’t get away?

Do the next best thing with a new Holiday SnowGlobe from RTP. Using Geo-location technology, a variety of familiar scenes and off-the-beaten path locales make this realistic—and FREE—SnowGlobe an instant App favorite!

We’ve made our App free in part because RTP wants to help underprivileged kids this holiday, by asking you to join us in support SOS Outreach or Youth Enrichment Services (YES), two organizations which help kids reach their potential through outdoor activities.

Features:
- Shake it, and watch it snow!
- Shake it more to make it snow more!
- Smooth animation makes it feel like it’s really snowing
- Touch our RTP icon, and it’ll take you straight to our website
- Tell your friends and family about it, and spread some holiday cheer!


Have a safe and happy holiday season!
